title: New Stagefright security exploit puts a billion Android devices at risk
text:
New Stagefright security exploit puts a billion Android devices at risk 
Published By: AndroidPit.com - Today 
The Android Stagefright security vulnerability is a big deal. We explain what it is, how to know if your Android is affected and what you ca...
